"Available", "takes_corners": false, "takes_freekicks": false, "takes_penalties": false, "form": 0.0, "ict_index": 122.2 }, ] const [ data, setData ] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/app/') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setData(data); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }); }, []); //Set theme to black when rendering the Statboard useEffect(() => { setTheme('black', 'grey'); }); const [ preferences, setPreferences ] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { setPreferences(getPreferencesChange()); }, []); return (

+Options

setPreferences(pref)} getPrefFunction={getPreferencesChange}/>
) }; function getPreferencesChange() { const hAxisInput = document.getElementById('select-h-ax').value; const vAxisInput = document.getElementById('select-v-ax').value; const isCheckedGKP = document.getElementById('GKP-CB').checked; const isCheckedDEF = document.getElementById('DEF-CB').checked; const isCheckedMID = document.getElementById('MID-CB').checked; const isCheckedFWD = document.getElementById('FWD-CB').checked; const minutesPlayed = document.getElementById('minutes-slider').value; const maxPrice = document.getElementById('max-price').value; const selectTeam = document.getElementById('select-team').value; const radiosAvail = document.getElementsByName('radio-availability'); let radioAvail; for (let i = 0; i < radiosAvail.length; i++) { if(radiosAvail[i].checked) { radioAvail = radiosAvail[i].value; } } const radiosShow = document.getElementsByName('radio-show'); let radioShow; for (let i = 0; i < radiosShow.length; i++) { if(radiosShow[i].checked) { radioShow = radiosShow[i].value; } } return [hAxisInput, vAxisInput, isCheckedGKP, isCheckedDEF, isCheckedMID, isCheckedFWD, minutesPlayed, maxPrice, selectTeam, radioAvail, radioShow] } let optionsClicked = false; function showOrHideMenu() { const dropDownMenu = document.getElementById('statsboard-options-container'); const optionsButton = document.getElementById('options-button'); if (!optionsClicked) { dropDownMenu.style.display = 'flex'; optionsButton.innerHTML = 'Close'; } else { dropDownMenu.style.display = 'none'; optionsButton.innerHTML = '+Options'; } optionsClicked = !optionsClicked; } export default Statsboard;
